TopicTitle: You know you're [s]serious[/s] addicted to roleplay when...

Articles.Content:
... You spend 30 dollars on things such as:

Rubber Mallet

Paint - lots of it

Cheap clothes

Briefcase
When you create the largest government project ever. I know you Radion, haha.

Rubber mallet?

Makavat Taheiros. The President carries a small, ornate mallet at all times, decorated with the flag, and most of the President\'s stats (i.e, other positions, names, etc.) I plan to make one. ;P
When over hal fof your post are from roleplay even though posts coming from roleplay only came recently.
When your post count goes from 150 to 850 in the same month Roleplay posts are counted.
When you can\'t sleep so you aimlessly hit F5 every few seconds
When you are up till 3 in the morning (and beyond) on easter, just designing aircraft.
When you\'re willing to pay 60 USD to get the Roleplay forum as a PC game.

When you\'re willing to pay 60 USD to get the Roleplay forum as a PC game.

-gets coding- ONE DAY I SHALL MAKE KSP RP GAME!

If not, at least a simulator for ksp esq wars.
